CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 25, 1956, page 2, reads: "When Teachers Meet - Among the Southern school teachers attending the American Federation of Teachers at the Penn-Sheraton Hotel this week are, left to right: Mrs. Veronica B. Hill, New Orleans, La.; Mrs. Catherine Johnson and Frank McClarin, Atlanta, Ga.; Mrs. Alberta G. Height, Chattanooga, Tenn., and Mrs. Ida A. Prather, retired school teacher, of Fulton County, Ga."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of four women and a man, left to right: Veronica B. Hill, Catherine Johnson, Frank McClarin, Alberta G. Height, and Ida A. Prather, wearing American Federation of Teachers name tags, standing in front of poster inscribed "American Teacher...Labor Support...Federationist" at the Penn Sheraton Hotel
